Package io.github.mizinchik

Interface Operator

All Known Implementing Classes:
Addition, BinaryOperator, Cosine, Division, Logarithm, Multiplication, Power, Sine, SquareRoot, Subtraction, UnaryOperator
public interface Operator
Class for operators working on up to two Double arguments and returning Double on apply.
